prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon with a haunting design and a shadowy aura.
I want a dragon Pokemon that embodies both power and mystery with dark colors.
Generate a multi-headed creature resembling a serpent, with ominous features and a regal look.
Make a legendary Pokemon that has a strong connection to the underworld and the afterlife.
Imagine a powerful ghost-dragon hybrid that dominates the realm of shadows and darkness.
Design a Pokemon with sharp, metallic features and an ethereal presence.
Give me a mythical creature that can traverse different dimensions with ease.
